name: Sculpto - Augmented Reality
description:
Join us in playing Sculpto! An AR team-based party game, where players work together and compete against other teams to create 3D sculptures, using only one device.

Sculpto is the result of a University project and is still in development.

You will need to download the .apk file to play.

 You will also need to download the scan target image and print it out, or have it clearly shown on another screen, then use your device's camera over it.
